settings.text: Who is The Better Period Method for?
settings.content:
The Better Period Method is for you if you‚Äôre wanting to discover a clear path to naturally balancing your hormones for better periods, balanced moods, more energy, enhanced vitality and more!¬†

If you feel disconnected from your body, confused by your hormones & suffer during your menstrual cycle The Better Period Method is for you.¬†

settings.text: What will I learn?
settings.content:
You will learn:¬†

‚Ä¢ The top myths about periods that hold women back¬†

‚Ä¢ How to identify signs of a normal VS abnormal menstrual cycle¬†

‚Ä¢ What causes common period problems such as period pain & PMS¬†

‚Ä¢ How to balance your hormones by addressing the Hormonal Hierarchy Of Needs¬†

‚Ä¢ How to regulate blood sugar & achieve adequate nutrient intake for optimal balance

‚Ä¢ How to eat & make a hormone healthy meals for better periods¬†

‚Ä¢ Nutritionist created recipes for balancing hormones¬†

‚Ä¢ The most common mistakes women make that prevent better periods¬†

‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll be able to identify what areas in your health need specific focus for healing¬†

And so much more!

settings.text: What do I get access to after purchase?
settings.content:
For an affordable price of only $17 you get access to:¬†

‚Ä¢ 3 x video classes with Nikki, founder of My Moonbox.¬†

‚Ä¢ 1 x 100+ page The Better Period Method E-book¬†

‚Ä¢ 1 x How to Eat For Your Cycle Recipe Ebook¬†

‚Ä¢ 1 x Daily Cycle-Care Routine Checklist

‚Ä¢ BONUS: Shopping lists, journal prompts & access to our private community¬†

Discounted from $197 for a limited time only.¬†

Ready to get everything you need to kickstart your journey to better menstrual health? This is life-changing stuff.

settings.text: Can I access it any time?
settings.content:
Yes! Once you sign up you get emailed immediate access to The Better Period Method video lessons,¬† e-books + additional bonuses.¬†

You also have life-time access, so you can refer to it any time you like.

settings.text: I‚Äôm short on time, how long does The Better Period Method go for?
settings.content:
The Better Period Method video series goes for a full 40 minutes over 3 x in-depth video lessons. The eBooks are over 100+ pages and are self paced.¬†

If you have any questions after watching the class, you can head over to our private facebook group and interact with the community & period experts for extra support!

settings.text: Does this Method promote a specific diet?
settings.content:
I don‚Äôt promote any dietary labels, restrictive eating or extremes. I introduce the foods that are supportive for your hormonal health, as well as discussing the foods that commonly contribute to hormonal imbalances and period symptoms.¬†

Nutrition is unique to every person and The Better Period Method invites an awareness as to what foods and way of eating works for your unique biochemistry and enables you to thrive.¬†

You‚Äôll get access to a step by step Meal Creation Guide, along with recipes that can be adapted to your dietary needs. All recipes are gluten free, dairy free and sugar free, with vegan options.

settings.text: Does this cover my specific condition or symptom?
settings.content:
The essential knowledge and strategies in this course is going to benefit EVERY condition and symptom.¬†

How is that possible?¬†

Because every system in your body is connected, and all symptoms and conditions connected to your menstrual cycle (whether it‚Äôs PMS, period pain, PMDD, irregular periods, endometriosis, adenomyosis, PCOS, fibroids etc) are symptoms of an underlying imbalance.¬†

The Better Period Method covers the essential FOUNDATIONS of hormonal & menstrual health that apply to every body - regardless of your condition, symptom, or age. It‚Äôs these key steps that are required to set strong foundations for yourself to begin healing your cycle, before doing anything else!

settings.text: Is this method for me if I‚Äôm on hormonal birth control?
settings.content:
YES! If you‚Äôre on hormonal birth control it is critical for you to be actively supporting your body to help improve your health and protect your body against potential side effects.¬†

Implementing the nutrition and lifestyle strategies shared in The Better Period Method will benefit your health whilst on birth control, but also ease your transition off birth control in the future as you‚Äôll have all the knowledge you need to support your hormones & rebalance naturally.¬†

Please note that you cannot balance your hormones whilst on birth control, as it works to do the opposite. However, you can support your body whilst on birth control to help improve your health as much as possible, and better understand your body and cycle.¬†¬†

settings.text: Who is the host of The Better Period Method?
settings.content: The Better Period Method is hosted by Nikki Gonda, nutritionist, period expert and founder of My Moonbox. With her company she is on mission to provide women with a natural approach to reclaiming hormonal health & transforming the way they experience their periods. Using her background in nutritional health science Nikki has helped thousands of women eliminate period problems through her signature Master Your Cycle Course & natural products and has witnessed the life changing rewards it offers for periods, fertility, overall health, careers and relationships.¬†

settings.text: What‚Äôs the difference between this & Master Your Cycle Course?
settings.content:
The Better Period Method focuses on the first essential steps you need to take to better understand your hormones, your menstrual cycle and what is required to effectively support your body in rebalancing your hormones and eliminating unwanted symptoms. This Method covers the essential foundations & strategies that are crucial for beginning your healing journey.¬†¬†

Master Your Cycle is my signature full course with 10 video sessions guiding you every step of the way to transforming your hormonal and menstrual health. The focus is on all factors impacting hormonal health, nutrition & lifestyle strategy and habit creation for lasting health.
